title: What has Zoe Kravitz been in and how is she related to Jason Momoa?
text:
Zoe Kravits is your new Catwoman (Picture: FilmMagic)

Forthcoming Bat-movie The Batman has found its Catwoman after actress Zoe Kravitz was cast in the role.

The 30-year-old was confirmed in the role by the film’s director Matt Reeves, sharing a gif on Twitter of Zoe talking into a phone saying: ‘Hello.’

She now takes on a part which has been previously played by the likes of Michelle Pfeiffer, Halle Berry and, most recently, Anne Hathway in 2012’s The Dark Knight Rises – playing alongside Robert Pattinson as he dons the Batsuit.

But where have you seen Zoe before? And just what is her connection to Aquaman star Jason Momoa?

Here’s what you need to know…

What else has new Catwoman star Zoe Kravitz been in?

Zoe, who is the daughter of rocker Lenny Kravitz, made her movie debut in 2007’s romantic drama No Reservations.

Since then she’s gone on to become a familiar face in blockbuster movies, having played Tempest – aka Angel Salvadore – in 2011’s X-Men: First Class, as well as appearing in the likes of Divergent, Mad Max: Fury Road and Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes Of Grindelwald, in which she was Leta Lestrange.

Zoe’s a familiar face to fans of Big Little Lies (Picture: AP)

You might also recognise her from the small screen, as she’s been in both seasons of Big Little Lies as Bonnie Carlson, while she also appeared in several episodes of Californication in 2011.

And her appearance as Catwoman in The Batman won’t be the first time that she’s had a brush with the role – as she also voiced the character in 2017’s The Lego Batman Movie.

How is Zoe Kravitz related to Jason Momoa?

Jason Momoa is stepdad to Zoe, being married to her mum Lisa Bonet (Picture: Getty Images)

Despite only being 10 years older than her, Jason is Zoe’s stepfather.

The Aquaman and Game Of Thrones star is married to Zoe’s mother, actress Lisa Bonet – who eloped with Lenny Kravitz when she was just 20 – although the pair split in 1993.

She and Jason have two children together – daughter Lola, who was born in 2007, and son Nakoa-Wolf who was born in 2008.

Jason has already revealed just how chuffed he is that Zoe has landed the role of Catwoman, taking to Instagram to congratulate her.

‘Posting a snap of the pair of them together, he said: ‘I’m so proud of you zozo bear. On and off screen OHANA. DC WB ohana Lola and Wolfie’s big sister is CAT WOMAN. Unbelievable so freaking stoked. Your going to have so much fun Aloha P Bear.’
